content: round color change round in mc knit all stitches 1 round next rounds still in mc k2 p1 7 rounds bind off all stitches loosely in pattern work thumb stitches with gap facing you slip live stitches from waste yarn on to needles when you come to the gap with mc pick up and knit 3 stitches place marker for the beginning of the round knit 4 rounds work rib pattern k2 p1 for 4 rounds bind off all stitches in pattern work your second mitt in the same way weave in all ends block to shape all colors and dye lots may vary it is best to always choose your yarn in person list of teams division team city / area founded mc cc1 cc2 joined atlantic new jersey red -
